mapper.select: SELECT * FROM channel_type_diff WHERE Province =#{Province} AND channel_type != "" ORDER BY Probablity DESC
SELECT * FROM channel_type_null WHERE Province =#{Province} ORDER BY Probablity DESC

SELECT * FROM channel_rate_null WHERE Province =#{Province} ORDER BY Probablity DESC

SELECT * FROM buz_rate_null WHERE Province =#{Province} ORDER BY Probablity DESC
